headline: Lucid Group (LCID): Assessing Valuation as Gravity SUV Launch and Uber Deal Spotlight Growth Potential
summary: Lucid Group (LCID) has kept investors buzzing lately, thanks to a surge in revenue, an uptick in vehicle deliveries, and the launch of the Gravity Touring SUV. The company’s deeper dive into Canada and its fresh tech alliance with Uber both hint at evolving ambitions beyond traditional auto manufacturing. See our latest analysis for Lucid Group. Lucid’s recent progress, including record vehicle deliveries, tech collaborations, and the Gravity Touring launch, has not translated into share...
